title: "Import Data"

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import data

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update names in "litters_df"

```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data!

```{r}
litters_df
```

Is the data clean?

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

#Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na =c("NA",".",""))
```
